channel.title: Really easy thing but im stupid dont know wat to do with client please help
channel.description:
ok i downloaded a client of mopar and i can use it on my server but i can only use my ip...like lets say somebody had this client theyd put there user and pass then ip and my ip but it wouldnt work cuz the client only let them logg on there own server
this is what i actually need help with how can i fix it so when people log on they can change the ip. to mine and it doesnt say error connecting to server but its actually on like zdiddy client like how alot of people can use it and it only for there client i want that please help me or give me a link 2 download a client were i can setup my ip.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2007, 09:23:48 PM[/size][hr]like how would i set the client to only loggg on my client and anybody can use it
